cause.description:
Many tortoises are packed in crates under TERRIBLE conditions and sent around the globe. If you must have a tortoise, buy captive-bred ones! Do not purchase wild-caught tortoises! This only encourages "dealers" to steal more from the wild.
NOTE: The Russian Tortoises in the picture were found in a crate full of maggots, with many of the torts suffering fractured shells, crushed skulls, and severed limbs. Many tortoises die this way.
To find out more about this: http://home.earthlink.net/~rednine/cites.htm
If you dont care about the tortoises, think about the effect on you: http://home.earthlink.net/~rednine/reasons.htm
Please help stop this destructive practice.
1. The Tortoise Trade must stop!
cause.mission: Save the innocent wild tortoises that are suffering because of the stupidity of some humans.
cause.name: Stop The Tortoise Trade!
